returns._0: rewardsTotal total amount of rewards claimed
rewardsTotal total amount of rewards claimed

_changeRewardAPRPerCont(uint8,int256).details: the model of calculating reward requires heavily on reduction percentage. Use reduction percent as the input. Negative percentages are allowed (if want to increase APR). 100_000_000 = 100%.
